goalContent: This collaborative map gathers the Paris pastry shops recommended by local communities.
contestwikipedia: The shortlist was crowdsourced from a cross-posted Facebook thread back in 2020.
goalContentEnd: Treat it as a time capsule: venues may have evolved since the original post.
capsuleDisclaimer: Crowdsourced Facebook post from 2020 (%YEARS% years later). Please double-check recent reviews—ownership, menus or schedules may have changed.
